description: a(n) = smallest k such that SEPSigma^{k}(n)=1, or -1 if no such k exists. Here SEPSigma(m) = (-1)^(Sum_i r_i)*Sum_{d|m} (-1)^(Sum_j Max(r_j))*d =Product_i (Sum_{1<=s_i<=r_i} p_i^s_i)+(-1)^r_i where m=Product_i p_i^r_i, d=Product_j p_j^r_j, p_j^max(r_j) is the largest power of p_j dividing m.
